colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 524

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would assist in
            financing the improvement and pavement of a 43 kilometer
            road from Coronel Oviedo to Villarrica and feasibility
            studies and final engineering of about 40 kilometers of
            all-weather roads in Southeastern Paraguay.
